entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.Text.Json.SourceGeneration.Tests are disabled in WASM #59228
    7.0.0
  • Refactor hosting and assembly loading to improve reliability, perf, and portability #59227
    7.0.0
  • FileNotFoundException for System.Security.Cryptography.Csp version 5. .NET doesn't know to look in C:\Program Files\dotnet directory? #59224
  • [interp] Support methods that need more than 64k data items #59221
    7.0.0
  • DataContractJsonSerializer with JObject results in stack overflow #59218
  • WebSocket UTF8 output validation doesn't throw #59214
  • Exporting a X509Certificate2Collection with PKCS7 on Windows produces DER with trailing zeros #59212
    7.0.0
  • [wasm] Make native builds Cancel friendly #59211
    7.0.0
  • Is the breaking change in PipeWriterStream.WriteAsync intentional? #59209
  • HttpWebRequest create many connections #59207
  • X509Certificate2Collection PKCS7 export throws on macOS if empty #59206
    7.0.0
  • "Reboot" button in setup after a repair does nothing #59198
  • The behavior of the BufferBlock<T>.Fault method appears to be inconsistent #59197
  • how to get native code address of generic method in class #59196
  • [dotnet-sdk-6.0.100-rc.2.21463.12] grandnode item name change from Chinese (Simplified, China). Zh-CN to Chinese (Simplified, China). Zh-Hans-CN #59193
    6.0.0
  • X.509 Extensions #59191
    Future
  • Control flow guard support in the JIT #59190
    7.0.0

Closed

  • Decrypted String Issues (chars missing) with System.Security.Cryptography -> AesCng and other classes for encryption/decryption in net6.0 rc1 #59219
  • Remove usused rd.xml files #51112
    Future
  • Source-build encounters circular PublishBuilder dependency in WasmAppBuilder #58816
    6.0.0
  • Add constructors XmlSerializerNamespaces #41431
    7.0.0
  • GCC warns when compiling the JIT: too small to hold all values of regNumber #33541
    Future
  • App published as single file fails to run in Windows 10.0.17763 containers #55405
    6.0.0
  • IXCLRDataMethodInstance.GetILAddressMap is broken in .NET 6 RC1 #59109
    6.0.0
  • System.Net.NetworkInformation.Functional.Tests fail on iOS #36890
    7.0.0
  • After updating to .net6-rc1 Blazor WebAssembly's old project is not loading and new project can't build #59156
    6.0.0
  • [BUG] TimeBeginPeriod / TimeEndPeriod strange behavior #59058
    Future
  • Loading csr or pem files in CertificateRequest #59192
  • 6.0 RC1: ImplicitUsings with .NET Framework 4.x - System.Net.Http is not available #59163
    7.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch Windows Checked build to `-O2` from `-O1` #59235
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Add superpmi.exe option to break to the debugger on exception. #59234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Change loop cloning condition blocks flow graph #59233
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0-rc2] Undo breaking change compat in GetMethodNativeMap #59231
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [interp] Disable optimization if the var index is greater than G_MAXUINT16 #59225
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Bump RC2 intellisense version #59223
    documentation, Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • ci test #59222
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [interp] Add wide data item index static load and stores #59220
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix PKCS7 export quirks #59217
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [MONO][WASM] Changed wasmapp.LocalBuild.props to use net6.0 #59213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Only set path in x64 mac installer when installing on x64 #59210
    * NO MERGE *, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [release/6.0] [iOS] Make sure IPGlobalProperties and NetworkInterface.GetIsNetworkAvailable methods return the correct info #59208
    area-System.Net
  • Use correct NumberStyle when parsing double and float #59205
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [HTTP/3] Fix NullReferenceException on Timeout when streaming request body #59204
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Suppress SendPacketsElement_FileStreamMultiPartMixed_MultipleFileStreams_Success test on Windows 11 #59203
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] Undo breaking change compat in GetMethodNativeMap #59199
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Single-file apps should not use copy-on-write mapping of the .exe on windows. #59194
    Servicing-consider, area-Single-File, 6.0.0

Merged

  • Improve morphing of comparisons #54204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Add support for native relinking after Build, and… #59153
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Fix link to CoreCLR profiler docs #59200
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Remove usused rd.xml files #59201
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Disable the clrinterpreter pipeline schedule #59229
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Failing test for DI's site call factory cache #59164
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Undo breaking change compat in GetMethodNativeMap #59114
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • support FEATURE_INTERPRETER on linux-x64 #59137
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Bump intellisense version to RC1 (main) #59115
    documentation, area-Infrastructure, 6.0.0
  • Implement UriCreationOptions #59173
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Update gcc CI to use gcc-11 container #59202
    community-contribution
  • Use getpwuid(3) in corehost for the $HOME-less user #59036
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • Use unsigned casts for array/Span indexers #57970
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Single-file apps should not use copy-on-write mapping of the .exe on windows. #59033
    area-Single-File
  • Share init-compiler with arcade #59018
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [iOS] Make sure IPGlobalProperties and NetworkInterface.GetIsNetworkAvailable methods return the correct info #57096
    area-System.Net, os-ios, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Unify BuildWasmRuntimes target and use cmake #58878
    area-Build-mono

Updated

  • Experiment with compressing individual method contexts #59000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix corner-case handling of cancellation exception in ForEachAsync #59065
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, 6.0.0
  • Allow folding of `LONG` nodes with field sequences #57605
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Return multiple likely classes in getLikelyClass (for better GDV) #58984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Allow contained indirections in tailcalls on x64 #58686
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Universal arm crossgen compiler #58279
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix underestimation of temps size #58969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • WIP: Cleanup of runtime test build scripts #58762
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Update ServiceProviderServiceExtensions.cs #58685
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Update source-gen APIs according to review #59042
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 6.0.0
  • Src gen: use GetBestTypeByMetadataName instead of GetTypeByMetadataName #59092
    6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Fix Logging Source Generator to handle file-scoped namespaces (#57894) #59100
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Logging
  • [mono][interp] Fix short branches #58806
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Rocky Linux support #59178
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Require UTF8 encoding in GetX509NameInfo #59172
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Security
  • [DRAFT][MONO][TEST] Wasm AOT runtime tests #57963
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono, wasm-aot-test
  • [wasm] WebSocket improve send/receive buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Optimize FMA codegen base on the overwritten #58196
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Use AVX2 in codegen for GT_STORE_BLK #55604
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Arm: Use correct form of store instruction when data is float #59187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • FreeBSD fix for AF_UNIX IPC socket permission #58688
  • [docs] Add instructions for debugging native runtime code on Android #59183
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • RID work for macOS 12 #59066
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • stress test sandboxing #57653
    * NO MERGE *, NO REVIEW
  • [release/6.0] MonoAOTCompiler: detect when nothing has changed, and skip any precompiling #58979
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Remove `Net5CompatFileStreamStrategy`. #57735
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Arm64: Make Float-to-Integer conversions compatible with x86 #58831
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Retrieve dumps from stress pipeline #58860
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Fix LDAP StartTLS on Linux #56641
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Fix ro segments with regions #58811
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Bring XmlReader{Async} to one behavior #51736
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 3] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration` #57414
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Group 2] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.Abstractions` #57401
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add initial regex source generator #59186
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Process.Unix: handle ETXTBSY error when executing file that was just written by .NET. #59079
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, community-contribution
  • Search native code in all R2R ni.dll in version bubble #57277
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Cleanup XPath.StringToDouble #55867
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [mono] Remove some of the restrictions on constrained calls from #59182
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [Group 1] Enable nullable annotations for `Microsoft.Extensions.FileSystemGlobbing` #57398
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Refactor XmlWriter{Async} #58105
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • CI matrix change: debian+centos+sles #58988
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Fix race condition with cancellation tokens in Read/Flush operations #59189
    area-System.IO.Pipelines

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: SSA for branching #1404

PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Release metadata for 6.0.0-rc.1 has wrong release date set #21054
  • Crash on WebsocketClient.ReceiveAsync with Memory<T> #21053

Closed

  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK #sdk-102548-.NET6.0.1xxSDK #19861
  • Build failed: Validate-DotNet/main real signed, sdk, .NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1, validation-sdk-.NET 6.0.1xx SDK RC 1 #sdk-102550-.NET6.0.1xxSDKRC1 #19859
  • Static Web Assets build error with .net 6 rc1 with .net 5 target #21056

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix null ref in update command #21063
    Area-Workloads
  • Update build.yml #21059
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Tweak the hot reload update toast #21058
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update build.yml #21057
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #21049
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add a test for SuppressRazorSourceGenerator incrementalism #20929
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update a bunch of test projects to the current target framework #20148
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding for 6.0.1xx branch #21033
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ShowMissingWorkloads for IPA VS top level workloads #21027
    Area-Workloads
  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.2xx #20996
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0.4xx' => 'main' #21025
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Allow specifying url for workload rollback #20991
    Area-Workloads
  • Warn when Targeting net6.0 with 16.11 and the 6.0 SDK #20987
    Servicing-consider, Area-NetSDK
  • Fix nuget config not being honored #20930
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adding retries to nuget package downloader #20727
    Area-Workloads
  • Add a static cache for GetAssemblyVersion #20993
    Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Inline rename couldn't rename a file #56467
  • Introduce Parameter doesn't #56466
  • Can't disable Code Style Suggestions #56461
  • Code Cleanup (Formating) Ignores VB.Net 'Pretty listing'-Setting #56459
  • IntelliSense completion to have component parameters before generic html attributes #56454
  • DiagnosticAnalyzer's Initialize method not getting called with VS 2019 upgardation #56449
  • CS8947 warning message mentions parameter type instead of its name #56447
  • Consider alternate design approach for 'BuildWithAnalyzers' marker file #56446
    17.0
  • AdhocWorkspace.OpenDocument(documentId) causes parallel execution errors #56445
  • RC1 regression: dependencies no longer work correctly in source generators across <ProjectReference> #56442
    17.0
  • Unclear diagnostic when inferring delegate type for a bad method group #56438
  • "Sequence contains no elements" thrown from EmitSolutionUpdateAsync #56431

Closed

  • Remove RoslynJsonConverter, JsonRpcConnection, RemoteEndPoint #45859
    Backlog
  • RZ10012 warning cannot be upgraded to error in .editorconfig #55921
    17.1
  • Generated XML doc from cref causes failed reference properties #53912
    17.0
  • Ruleset setting takes precedence over .editorconfig #55920
    17.0
  • File scoped namespace is not generated anymore in .Net 6 RC1 #56410
    17.0
  • nint/nuint are recommended as preprocessor directives in scripting context #49743
    Backlog
  • error MSB6006: "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 on a complex switch expression #48493
    17.0
  • Specifying the initialization type of static constructors #4448
    Backlog
  • C# IntelliSense no longer have an option to only trigger on "Enter or Tab" #5200
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent DeclaredAccessibility for property symbol between languages #7899
    Backlog
  • Roslyn dlls being loaded on clicking "New Project" on VS #8235
    Backlog
  • Fully-qualified path for Type defined in different Solution (cross solution project reference) #14493
    Backlog
  • Trying to add two dll references into all projects under a solution, some will fail while others will work. #16891
    Backlog
  • Roslyn 2.0 unable to compile TypeScript enabled web project #17915
    Backlog
  • VS 15.4.1 usage unbearably slow when Git source control plug-in is enabled #22822
    Backlog
  • VS compiler error BC30652 on a COM DLL method using referenced enumeration #24125
    Compiler.Next
  • HelpCommand() test is failing on CoreCLR builds #24402
    Compiler.Next
  • Unexpected slowness with javascript #24503
    Backlog
  • Update documentation on the C# /debug command line switch #25373
    Compiler.Next
  • GetCompilationAsync() taking so much time #25600
    Backlog
  • ReplacePropertyWithMethodsCodeRefactoringProvider caused NullReferenceException #25910
    Backlog
  • Visual Studio 2017 Pro (15.6.5) System.NullReferenceException in bingdev #26064
    Backlog
  • Bad binding redirects when referencing roslyn indirectly #26359
  • IDE0019 suggests C# 7.1-compatible fixes on a 7.0 project #26485
    Backlog
  • Why are code fixes not offered when the Warning Level is set to less than 4? #28116
    Backlog
  • 'BC36970 Failed to emit module' error occurs after changes in edit and continue #28224
    Backlog
  • Can't view managed variable content in debugger (mixed mode) due to System::Object in System.Runtime assembly #28477
    Backlog
  • Optimization of exception handling in async methods #28759
    Compiler.Next
  • code completion: constructor to assign a member does not show argument candidates #28806
    Backlog
  • Edit and continue does not work in Preview 5 #28845
    Backlog
  • CompilationOptions.Platform is not giving the configuration option used for msbuild #29369
    Backlog
  • Error after updating Visual Studio 2017 to v15.8.2 when running unit tests: Method 'Microsoft.Build.Utilities.ToolLocationHelper.GetPathToStandardLibraries' not found #29810
    Backlog
  • Can we have an option to not report IDE0009 (this. prefix) when a member starts with underscore? #30130
    Backlog
  • How to clear the global state (static cache) used across analyzer instances #30213
    Backlog
  • Custom Attribute type is always ErrorType in NetCore #30248
    Backlog
  • How to compile with MetadataImportOptions.All #30723
    Backlog
  • C# Code Formatting is messed up #31016
    Backlog
  • GetAllTypes Can't get baseType #31115
    Backlog
  • AbstractReferenceFinder is crashing ServiceHub with NullReferenceException #31325
    Backlog
  • Proposal: Fix all occurrences in open documents #31586
    Backlog
  • SyntaxFactory.ForStatement has incorrect nullable annotations #56414
    17.1

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove JSON serialization helpers #56465
    Area-IDE
  • Set CompilerApiVersion in Microsoft.Managed.Core.targets #56460
    Area-Compilers
  • Migrate to consistent pattern for ISyntaxFacts #56458
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56456
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.0-vs-deps back to release/dev17.0 #56451
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Implement INamespaceTypeReference.GetUnit for RootModuleType #56450
    Area-Compilers
  • Guard against updates with no type changes #56443
    Area-IDE
  • When we're loading dependencies in VS, don't require exact versions #56432
    Area-Analyzers

Merged

  • Clean up props/targets #56464
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • More instrumentation on flaky test TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #56462
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Remove legacy RPC #56426
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56457
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56455
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56453
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56452
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Only allow Contract.ThrowIfNull() to be called on nullable types #56433
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Verify xmldoc for cref to positional property #56396
    Test, New Language Feature - Records, Next
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56444
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56441
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56439
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56440
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix api violations in ISyntaxFacts #56434
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix cases where we were showing 'nint/nuint' in preprocessor directives. #56418
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56437
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56435
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56436
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add reproducer for pattern matching crash #56425
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Fix nullable annotations #56422
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56428
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56429
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56430
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56427
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56470
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56469
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56468
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix partial method doc comments #56419
    Area-Compilers
  • Update to ICSharpCode.Decompiler 7.1.0.6543 #53304
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Ensure local function invocations and method references always have null receivers #56395
    Area-Compilers
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Avoid several breaking changes in overload resolution from inferred types of lambda expressions and method groups #56341
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Add support for all parenthesized binary additions of interpolated strings #56333
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements
  • Update UnitTesting Hot Reload API to consider syntax errors #56379
    Area-IDE
  • Store information about special attributes in the decl table to avoid going back to source unnecessarily. #56402
    Area-Compilers
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • features/list-patterns #54864
    PR For Personal Review Only
  • Handle interaction of VB with Static Abstract Members in interfaces #56375
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - StaticAbstractMembersInInterfaces

    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Don't skip suppressors with /skipAnalyzers #54969
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Add completion tests for parameters in top-level statements #56385
    Area-IDE
  • Filter the directive trivia when code generation service try to reuse the syntax #56222
    Area-IDE
  • Add documents to PDB for types that have no methods with IL #56278
    Area-Compilers

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improve ChildContent RenderFragment completion experience #36634
    Razor.Tooling
  • DateOnly passing to JSRuntime no longer supported in Blazor 6.0.0-rc.1 #36631
  • Not able to trap the LifetimeEventsHostedService on Windows Shutdown or Restart #36630
  • Extract Method support #36624
  • Directive completions seem to disappear with larger completion lists #36623
    17.0-Preview5
  • F12 support for class libraries outside of the project #36622
  • EventCallback type modifications don't re-trigger TagHelper resolution #36621
    17.0-Preview5
  • MSB3277 warnings when referencing Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel.Core and System.Security.Cryptography.Cng #36619
  • Surround with (snippets) not available #36616
  • Extract to new component refactoring #36615
  • Default editor colors let TextMate shine through #36614
    17.0-Preview5
  • References not recognizing private fields #36612
  • Startup regression: plaintext #36611
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries #36610
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #36609
  • Renaming class name in a code behind of a Razor page should rename the component #36608
  • Refactoring or Code Style to wrap HTML attributes on multiple lines #36607
  • Integration tests in Asp.Net 6 #36606
    6.0-rc2
  • NavigationOption: ScrollAfterNavigation:false => Prevents scroll after navigation #36605
  • Import SCSS file from NuGet package's '_content/<<library>>/' #36604
  • SecurityStampTest.OnValidateIdentityDoesNotExtendExpirationWhenSlidingIsDisabled #36601
    6.0-rc2
  • Return ok from controller before async Task complete #36600
  • RC1 update issue: Blazor don't wait for js interop call and its executed the code synchronous way #36599
    6.0.0
  • TestServer can not resolve route for URI with HTTP encoded parameters #36598
  • Hot reload breaks between compilations #36595
    6.0.0
  • Perf regression: plaintext #36594
  • razor editor cshtml javascript formatting not working in vs2022 preview4 #36592
  • API proposal: ObjectPool IServiceCollection helper extension #36586
  • String-Value of View() is clickable allowing you to jump into the cshtml file #36585
  • Code Analysis to validate views in ASP.NET #36584

Closed

  • Formalized Blazor Wasm Capacitor/Cordova Support #23152
    Backlog
  • NET 6 RC1 Blazor Wasm SignalR WebSockets authentication fails. #36541
  • [Epic] HTTP/3 support in ASP.NET Core #15271
    6.0.0
  • Kestrel hangs #36274
  • role based routing support #36524
  • MVC actions returning Problem Details should return the standard media type for Problem Details responses #36560
    6.0-rc2
  • Minimal APIs should return the standard media type for Problem Details responses #36557
    6.0-rc2
  • Update razor page item template to react to changes with implicit usings, etc. #35073
    6.0.0
  • Blazor Server .NET 6 new project template issues #36572
  • Startup regression: fortunes #36401

  • Blazor wasm: dotnet watch hot reload 100% CPU on Ubuntu #33471

  • Razor compilation errors started happening from VS2019 v16.10, potentially due to path lengths #33585

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] Cannot run iOS simulator on MacBook Pro Big Sur #2554
  • [Bug] "Path not Legal Form" when creating a MAUI app project from Preview8 templates #2553
  • [Bug] `IsPassword="True"` leads to an initialization crash when run as Win10 app #2552
  • Maui.Android debugger is not working correctly Net6 (RC1) #2550
  • [Bug] Grid ColumnDefinition and RowDefinition do not reset when setting collection with new values. #2545
  • Hot Reload on MAUI Blazor App does not works. #2527
  • [Bug] [Android] System.InvalidOperationException: 'LoadTemplate should not be null' when setting CollectionView with empty data template. #2526
  • [Bug] [WinUI] Replacing CollectionView ItemTemplate Programmatically sets items to zero height, doesn't clear old items. #2525
  • Remove references to Reloadify3000 #2524
  • [Bug] [Android] InvalidOperationException "NavigationStack cannot be empty" when attempting back navigation on empty NavigationPage #2521
  • [Bug] VS2022 Preview 4 deploys to iOS device but does not debug #2520
  • [Bug] Update SecureStorage to use AndroidX Security #2518
  • [Bug] Replacing MainPage with a NavigationPage does not work #2517
  • [Enhancement] For fresh install MAUI #2514

Closed

  • Javascript Callbacks In WPF Blazor Not Working #2544
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • IsNullOrWhiteSpace with non-string #2324
  • [Bug] .NET MAUI Blazor App [WinUI] is blank (on 21H1?) #1617
  • [Bug] Visual Studio 2022 Preview 4 shows old MAUI templates #2489
  • [Bug] Blazor maccatalyst #1299
  • How does the new Maui Blazor Template can run on Windows? #2506

PullRequests

Created

  • Winui navigation view #2551

Merged

  • [workload] rename Microsoft.Maui.Controls.Sdk #2502
  • Update Maui.Graphics #2513
  • Update WebView2 to 1.0.961.33 #2504
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Update to preview versioning scheme #2497
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #2508
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • More Source Generators #2501
  • [android] add AOT profile for .NET MAUI #2496
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
  • Merge all the .NET 6 projects/solutions #2505
  • Update template so you can find it under Windows as well #2484
    area/templates
  • [Handlers] Add IndicatorView handler for iOS and Android #2038
  • Use Essentials over the old Device class #2488
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Shadow Support #570
    6.0.100-rc.1
  • [Android] Clean up a little bit WebView #2431

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query: we can uniquely identify keyless entities that have Distinct operation applied on them #26078
  • Query: further improve translation of queries with Distinct or Groupby in correlated subquery, when entity identifiers are not easy to obtain #26077
  • Update snapshots when a shared-identity entry is added #26076
  • Navigation to principal on deleted dependent is cleared when principal is detached #26074
  • 6.0.0-rc.1.21452.10: Navigations can only target entity types with keys #26073
  • WHY NOT VIEWS !?!? #26072
  • Customization of the ordering of extensions #26071
  • CreateAggregate state is shared, breaking multiple use of an aggregate function in the same query #26070
  • Allow test seeding data to be intercepted/tweaked by providers #26068
  • Removing a migration adds a `(string)null` argument to all ToTable calls in the snapshot #26067
  • What is the recommended way to do DDD Value Objects in EF Core? #26065
  • optimize query sql #26064
  • .NET 6 RC1 - Migrations not going through/code-first not updating database #26063
  • Upgrading packages from .NET 5 to .NET 6 RC 1 seems to break existing migrations #26062
  • Scaffold-DbContext with NoPluralize flag incorrectly singularizes the navigation property name for the collection #26061
  • Scaffold-DbContext in EF Core results are different from models from edmx ( using Database first approach) #26060

Closed

  • Query: query with group by in subquery produces invalid SQL #15279
    6.0.0
  • Test that provider convention sets replace all instances of a given convention #26017
  • Problems with GroupBy #26046
    6.0.0-rc2
  • Migrations do not fully qualify types, resulting in compile errors #25933
  • Temporal tables tests are broken #26047
    6.0.0
  • Unable to translate collection subquery in projection #25315
    6.0.0
  • System.TypeLoadException after upgrade to 6.0.0-rc.1.21452.10 : Method 'AppendIdentityWhereCondition' does not have an implementation #26059
  • Performance issue when using multiple includes and QueryFilters #25731
  • Query: parameter nullability sniffing broken for global query filters #24645
  • EF Core database insert fails when table has a SQL INSTEAD OF trigger #12064

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #24490 - Update exception message when correlated collection cannot be projected #26079
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26075
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Adding grouping tests from EF6 #26069
  • [6.0-rc2] Fully support int identity seed #26066

Merged

  • [6.0-rc2] Adding regression test for #15279 #26081
  • [6.0-rc2] Fix Fluent APIs on keys in model snapshot #26058
    Servicing-consider
  • [6.0-rc2] Query: Translate ToList over grouping element #26054
    providers-beware, Servicing-consider
  • Query: Fix temporal table tests #26056
    tell-mode
  • [6.0-rc2] Add regression test for #25315 - Unable to translate collection subquery in projection #26057
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/3.1' => 'main' #26033
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/5.0' => 'main' #26032
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #26026
    area-infrastructure, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Stabilize versions for 6.0.0 RTM #26051
    area-infrastructure
  • Query: Throw better error message when final result contains IGrouping #26050

Updated

  • Query: add translation for string.IndexOf(string, int) #25396 #25655
    waiting-for-response
  • [6.0-rc2] Fixup deleted join entities #26036
  • Update helix.proj #26055
